Thank you. We had to put him down today. Hes been a constant member in our household for 15-years. Everything he loved had been a struggle in the last 2-months. He didnt even want to roll on the lawn. Im glad our kids were able to be with him in the last monuments. https://t.co/YX3QjIy03G

@gatatata13 Copyright infringement (at times referred to as piracy) is the use of works protected by copyright law without permission for a usage where such permission is required, thereby infringing certain exclusive rights granted to the copyright holder.
